apply.description: Select the backup file to be restored.
apply.file.label: Backup file name
apply.file.hint: Drag file here or click to select
apply.security.hint: Enter the password used for creating the backup file
apply.confirm.title: Confirm restore
apply.confirm.text: This action might affect running processes. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding. The device might restart several times.
apply.progress.title: Restoring...
apply.source.label: Backup file storage
apply.setup-file.label: Backup file
apply.summary.text: You are about to restore devices settings according to the backup file "{{param}}".

notice.general.item1: Apps may be installed or uninstalled. Device settings are updated, added or deleted.
notice.general.item2: The device reboots automatically if required.
notice.general.item3: After updating the device you may need to login with updated credentials.
notice.general.item4: Network settings might be changed. You may need to reconnect to the device.

apply.restoreMode.title: Remove apps and settings which are not part of the backup file
apply.restoreMode.warning.text:
May uninstall apps, remove configuration archives, delete user accounts, ...
This option should only be used with full backups.
apply.tab.label: Restore

create.description: Select the device settings and resources to be added to the backup file.
create.format.label: File format
create.storage.title: Storage
create.storage.label: Backup file storage
create.security.description:
Secrets can only be included if a password is provided.
The password is required to restore the backup.
create.progress.title: Creating backup...
create.summary.fullBackup:
You are about to create a full backup for architecture "{{param1}}" and hardware "{{param2}}".
A full backup is typically used to restore the content of the backup file as is.
create.summary.partialBackup:
You are about to create a partial backup for architecture "{{param1}}" and hardware "{{param2}}".
A partial backup is typically used to apply selected content of the backup file.

notice.general.item1: Backup may include settings like licenses and certificates which can only be restored on the same device.
notice.general.item2: Restoring is restricted to devices with the same major version of the firmware.
notice.general.item3: Disabled apps and the logbook are not included in the backup.

create.tab.label: Backup

history.title: History
history.name: Name
history.delete.title: Delete entry
history.delete.description: History entry from {{param}} will be deleted.
